=C2=A0Sooooo, I must be paranormal! That definition is useless. That just m=
eans anything that is not understood is paranormal, anything that doesn't h=
appen everyday is paranormal. Thinking the boxes or ghost fit this extremel=
y wide paranormal definition is is useless. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0The main problem =
here=C2=A0are those few that think somehow they are so much=C2=A0more quali=
fied and superior that they can dictate how and what everyone else thinks a=
nd does. There are sick individuals on both sides, believers and skeptics=
=C2=A0that fall into this. I know one guy that has to believe the boxes and=
 seemingly=C2=A0all things paranormal started with him and he'll threaten v=
iolence on anyone that disagrees. Another thinks he is the only one that pr=
operly use the boxes and can determine who uses them. How many sites are on=

=
=C2=A0
=C2=A0What about the skeptics that can accept no evidence--they too =
claim there is nothing paranormal, but they can't test any boxes themselves=
, can not accept any evidence, and thus having nothing to stand on resort t=
o name calling to try to get the paranormal to go away. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0As fa=
r as threatening goes, does anyone realize threatening via e-mail is a fede=
ral crime? The FBI does in fact have a site set up for reporting these crim=
es. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0I remember reading in some books when I was younger how t=
he paranormal and psychic endeavours are not for everyone, some get into th=
is field and go insane, and there is evidencee for that. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0F-S

 Does something have to be presented on TAPS, or maybe Discovery Channel to=

how anything paranormal,=C2=A0 I ask experts to help with the tests: the ex=
perts being the people here. That I way I can learn.=C2=A0 I have contribut=

 were not positive results, I did not "tout it all over the web".=C2=A0 I h=
ave not criticized.=C2=A0 I just don't automatically believe everything peo=
ple tell me.=C2=A0 
=C2=A0
I don't understand why you would think that shou=
ld be reason to be kicked out of the group.
